title: Here and there in the Home Land. England, Scotland and Ireland as seen by a Canadian. ... Profusely illustrated
author: Haight, Canniff.
snippet: but we had not sufficient time left to see it with anysatisfaction, so we turned into great Pulteney Street andwalked up to Sydney Gardens, and from thence to theCircus and Royal Crescent, and from this to the stationRichard Cœur de Lion granted Bath its first charter as afree borough, 1297.
